comments.content: Can't find a perfect match but are some similar ones: [Bing GD](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830010307/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/galapagos/bing) Black (slightly unshearing it and reworking /M centre vertex bottom), [Bandera](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830010307/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/andrijtype/bandera-pro), [Atenea Egyptian](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830010307/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/eurotypo/atenea-egyptian) (possibly the closest), [Nexa Slab FFF](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830010307/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/font-fabric/nexa-slab) (reworking /M centre vertex bottom)
